title: Alpha Leak | The Bull Case for Euler
description:
On this episode of Alpha Leak, David is joined by Euler Co-Founder, Michael Bentley. Euler is a non-custodial, permissionless lending protocol on Ethereum with some interesting features you should know about.

This episode was recorded in early July, but the alpha is still very timely.
